                        <p>I am YAMINI, a final year CSE student at
 GITAM University Bengaluru. I live with
 parents and a  younger sister. Since I was
 young, I have had a deep passion for
 creating handcrafted products such as
 making silk thread jewelry, reusing old and
 waste materials into home decors, and
 crafting handmade gifts using quilling
 papers. Over the years, my love for this
 craft has grown stronger driving me to
 pursue it as a business venture.<br>My business focuses on the creation of handcrafted products which
 includes silk thread jewelry, upcycling old and waste materials into home decor and wall hangings, and crafting handmade gifts. My goal is to provide beautifully designed, eco-friendly products that add a personal touch to every home and special occasion.</p>
